ComicInfo.Title: Snake Hunt Part 9
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary:
Featuring EVERY SINGLE MEMBER OF G.I. JOE, including never-before-seen origins!
“SNAKE HUNT” Part 9
Cobra Commander wants a Snake Eyes of his own. The Joes have other ideas. It’s all hands on deck for both G.I. JOE and Cobra as living legend Larry Hama and fan-favorite artists Robert Atkins and Netho Diaz continue this massive 10-issue event! There’s no halftime break in this contest, folks! All action, all the time!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Robert Atkins (a) & J. Brown (c) | 1, 3 | B | Cover B | Jamie Sullivan (a), Jesse Heagy (c) & Audrey Sullivan (c) | 4 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | John Royle (a), Jagdish Kumar (a) & James Offredi (c) | 5 | RE | East Side Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Scarlett in Helicopter) | Kirill Repin | 6 | RE | East Side Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Scarlett Standing) | Kirill Repin | 7 | RE | East Side Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Lady Jaye Dress) | Mike Mayhew | 8 | RE | East Side Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Lady Jaye Uniform) | Mike Mayhew | 9 | 2nd | Second Print Variant Cover | Toy Packaging Art | 2 | Note: The digital edition (9/2/2020) for this issue was released before the print edition.
